ModMetaData.name: [PA] SpriteEvo - WIP
ModMetaData.author: Paluto22
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.0.0

 SpriteEvo - WIP
 Integrate Spine-Unity Runtimes functionality into Rimworld to provide powerful 2D animation capabilities.
 Support for Spine3.8/4.1/4.2 Runtimes
 Supports generating animations at specified locations, and you can render them like normal Textures
